ygData.subject: Re: Getting a GUILD up and going...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is just me, I know - but I have no issue with playing multiple characters across multiple servers. That s how I got a necro on one, a magician on the
ygData.messageBody:
>From: scollier@...
>
>
>I think getting a GUILD started is a GREAT idea...however...some of us are
>on different servers. We need unification..yes..I looked that word up just
>for this occasion! Lets start by saying what server we are all currently
>on, which character we play the MOST and go from there. The ONLY problem I
>see is that we may have to play our favorite character half time while we
>play our 'GUILD' character the other half. SHAME we cant transfer
>characters from server to server..sigh. Give me some feedbaack FOLKS! HUGS!
>
>
>Sandy

This is just me, I know - but I have no issue with playing multiple
characters across multiple servers.

That's how I got a necro on one, a magician on the PvP server, etc.

(I have DSL - switching in the course of an evening is not an issue).

So here's one vote for a guild on the new server (where newbie characters
have a better chance in the Big Field of Players...:-)

AND it's the role-playing server, anyway.

Alex
Skarrin on The Rathe
Morfael on Rallos Zek
